description:
This mod contains some useful tools for an admin.

[code][h1][b]Currently this mod has[/b][/h1]
- [b]Admin Tool[/b] (allows the admin to destroy/paint/explode stuff by just aiming on the object with a spudgun)
- [b]Player Kicker[/b]
- [b]World Cleaner[/b]
- [b]Free Camera Tool[/b]
- [b]Permission Manager[/b][/code]

This mod will get more updates in the future.
name: OP Tools
